name: innards-out
effect: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.
short_effect: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.
